item.title: CLI
item.description: In this page will document my knowledge on command line interface. My setup Tmux for terminal management. Starship as shell prompt.

item.title: cURL
item.description: Articles Linux curl Command Explained with Examples. Examples 1 curl -X POST <https://getpocket.com/v3/oauth/authorize> -d "code=string&consumer_key=string" -X to specify the request type.
